Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Masterpiece \Mas"ter*piece`\, n. Anything done or made with extraordinary skill; a capital performance; a chef-d'[oe]uvre; a supreme achievement. [1913 Webster]
The top and masterpiece of art. --South. [1913 Webster]
Dissimulation was his masterpiece. --Claredon. [1913 Webster]
masterpiece n 1: the most outstanding work of a creative artist or craftsman [syn: {chef-d'oeuvre}] 2: an outstanding achievement
